abstract: The carmaker said that it would reduce production in North America by 75 percent in the next six weeks to conserve a limited supply of parts made in Japan.
snippet: The carmaker said that it would reduce production in North America by 75 percent in the next six weeks to conserve a limited supply of parts made in Japan.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT — Toyota Motor said on Tuesday that it would cut production at its North American plants by 75 percent in the next six weeks to conserve its limited supply of parts made in Japan.

headline.main: Toyota Plans to Reduce Production for 6 Weeks
headline.print_headline: Toyota Plans To Reduce Production For 6 Weeks
